EditorData.stateContext: Bex and Danis walking towards each other, eyes locked

Text.Value: Don't get too comfortable. We won't be safe here for long.
You were in trouble - I wanted to help. Simple as that.
You are. And we'll never forget it - never ever.

EditorData.NodeContext: Smiling about silly Danis making a joke of everything. Stage whisper the 'You are'.

Text.Value: Thank you. Really.

EditorData.NodeContext: As heartfelt and sincere as 3 words can be.

Text.Value: Maybe not. But we have each other now. We have this moment now - thanks to you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: bex takes danis hand in hers
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
"Maybe not." addressed to the player.
"But we have each other now." turns back to Danis
Bex takes one of Danis's hands on "this *moment*"

Text.Value: It was the right thing to do.
It was convenient. Next time, it might not be.
Come here, darling.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Embrace anim then stare into each others eyes, stand near each other loop
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Danis and Bex embrace completely. They are so fckn happy to be reunited after Danis was taken to MOO. They end their hug and gaze into each others' eyes at the end of the node

Text.Value: I was so scared I'd lost you.
Here - take these for the road. It's the least I can do.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Hand off produce inventory animation in library
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Hands the player an item off-camera
EditorData.SFXTags: [EG] Sound of paper item being taken out/passed

Text.Value: I suppose it seemed pertinent.
We'll take it.

EditorData.NodeContext: With a smile, accepting the player's remote reason for helping them. She's sincere and grateful.

Text.Value: How lucky we are to have met you. I believe you're the noblest person I've ever known.
I wouldn't get too comfortable - it won't be safe here forever.
This isn't the first time you've helped us - saved our lives, really. Why?

EditorData.AnimationTags: Hand still on shoulder, bex breaks away and turns to player stepping forward
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bex breaks away and steps toward player, looks at them closely.

Text.Value: A beautiful sight, and all thanks to me.

EditorData.stateContext: Bex standing in front of Danis, facing the player.

Text.Value: Credit where it's due - Bex, this is the one who helped me and the others escape.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Danis puts Hand on Bex's shoulder - turning head between her and player as lines are said.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
"Credit where it's due" turns to player
"Bex' - Danis places hand on Bex's shoulder and looks at her
"This is the one who helped me" alternates between player and Bex to make introductions
EditorData.NodeContext: With a chuckle, super happy and amused by the player even though player's being a prick

Text.Value: Smile. They look so happy.
It's hard to believe. You were so callous, I didn't think you gave a damn about us. And yet you helped us - again. Why?

EditorData.NodeContext: Talking to player, confused - they spoke to you harshly and cruelly earlier, but just found out they saved your partner's life

Text.Value: We'll never forget it. Never ever.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bex brings a hand to her heart

Text.Value: Leave them to it.
Hey!

EditorData.NodeContext: Mock hurt, as in 'I thought I was the noblest person you've ever known'

Text.Value: Whatever your motivation, we're grateful. We've had a tough row to hoe - but thanks to you, we just might make it.
You're all right. My gods, you're all right!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Danis and Bex facing each other

Text.Value: You might have the manners of an imp, but I believe you're the noblest person I've ever known.
Let's hope there is no next time.

EditorData.NodeContext: With a chuckle. Danis is inveterately good-natured and is simple sincere here.

Text.Value: You make it sound so easy. But I know the lengths you've gone to on our behalf.
Thanks aren't enough, but we'll give them anyway. Every day, for the rest of our very long lives.

EditorData.NodeContext: With a twinkle in his eye. He's grateful to the player.

Text.Value: Whoa! Darling, this is the person who helped me escape that wretched place.

EditorData.NodeContext: pleading the player's case, surprised by Bex's reaction

Text.Value: I could ask myself the same question.
Me too. But we're here now. Safe.
Let me get a good look at you. My gods, Bex. I can't believe we almost lost each other.

EditorData.AnimationTags: place hand on arm and drop it
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Danis puts a hand on Bex's arm and lets his eyes search her face.
Return to initial state after "My gods, Bex."
EditorData.NodeContext: Recovering from his emotions, cheering up momentarily, then coming back into the gravity of the situation.

EditorData.stateContext: Bex and Danis standing close together, after embrace

Text.Value: Here we're fighting for our lives and you're working on your memoir. Well - I'll take it, after all you've done.

EditorData.NodeContext: With a chuckle. Danis is inveterately good-natured and is kind of having the bants with the player. Softens into sincerity toward the end.

Text.Value: It's wonderful to see you two back together.
For the experience, I guess.
I'd be much more comfortable if you'd leave us the hells alone.

EditorData.AnimationTags: From staring, turn to player and step forward angrily (Possible Construction anims)
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bex spots you and steps toward the player angrily.
EditorData.NodeContext: Angry. Player has intruded on a private moment and Bex hates the player in this permutation

Text.Value: Leave.
You might have the manners of an imp, but you have a noble heart. Thank you.
Never again. You hear me? Never.

Synopsis: Danis and Bex are reunited in the Last Light Inn after the player has saved Danis from being trapped in MOO. The two are ecstatic to see one another for the first time in a long time and very grateful to the player.
